local_intent: Execute transfer placement on red_plate: detect target, move/align above it, lower until contact, verify contact, open gripper to release, and retreat.
assumptions: red_plate is within sensor view and reachable
contact sensing is available and calibrated
gripper is already holding the white plate prior to this subtree
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'move above red_plate' micro-goal from the global sequence and continues with placement (lower, verify contact, release, retreat) consistent with the overall transfer plan.
